description: Claude Code hooks configuration for development workflow enforcement

hooks.description: Validate context and workflow state before agent execution
Validate agent output and update coordination files
Quality gates and TDD validation before code changes

setup_instructions: 1. Copy this file to your Claude Code settings directory
2. Update file paths if needed for your environment
3. Enable/disable hooks as needed for your workflow
4. Test with development commands to verify hooks work

hook_descriptions.pre-task-validation: Ensures proper context validation before agent execution
hook_descriptions.post-agent-validation: Validates agent output structure and runs basic quality gates
hook_descriptions.pre-edit-validation: Enforces TDD and checks quality gates before code changes

troubleshooting.hook_failures: Check script permissions and file paths
troubleshooting.path_problems: Ensure scripts are executable and paths are correct
